summary.span: 命名空間提供 元件，可讓您按照指定的間隔引發事件。

span.span: The namespace provides the component, which allows you to raise an event on a specified interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件是伺服器為基礎的計時器，它可讓您指定週期性間隔應用程式中，就會引發事件。The component is a server-based timer, which allows you to specify a recurring interval at which the event is raised in your application. 然後，您可以處理這個事件來提供正常處理。You can then handle this event to provide regular processing. 例如，假設您有重要的伺服器，必須保持在 24 小時一天、 一週 7 天。For example, suppose you have a critical server that must be kept running 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. 您可以建立使用服務定期檢查的伺服器，並確保系統已啟動並執行。You could create a service that uses a to periodically check the server and ensure that the system is up and running. 如果系統沒有回應，服務可能嘗試重新啟動伺服器，或通知系統管理員。If the system is not responding, the service could attempt to restart the server or notify an administrator. 以伺服器為基礎設計用於與多執行緒環境中的背景工作執行緒。The server-based is designed for use with worker threads in a multithreaded environment. 伺服器計時器可以在執行緒之間移動處理所引發事件，導致更多的精確度，比在時間上引發事件的 Windows 計時器。Server timers can move among threads to handle the raised event, resulting in more accuracy than Windows timers in raising the event on time.
